response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's time to share its worth. We propose a transaction price of $12,500 for the product. This figure reflects not only its intrinsic value but also aligns closely with its worth to you, aiming to ensure a fair exchange for both parties. We look forward to discussing this further and potentially making this a mutually beneficial arrangement.", "product_price": 12500}
